concept.description: Add a property 'fanIn' to a Type with the number of other types depending on them.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type:File) WHERE exists(t.byteCodeVersion) WITH t OPTIONAL MATCH (t)<-[:DEPENDS_ON]-(dependent:Type) WITH t, COUNT(dependent) as Dependents SET t.fanIn = Dependents RETURN t.fqn as Type

concept.description: Add a property 'fanOut' to a Type with the number of other types they depend on.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type:File) WHERE exists(t.byteCodeVersion) WITH t OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependent:Type) WITH t, COUNT(dependent) as Dependents SET t.fanOut = Dependents RETURN t.fqn as Type

concept.description: Add a property 'typeCoupling' to a Type as sum of fanIn and fanOut.
concept.cypher: MATCH (t:Type:File) WHERE exists(t.byteCodeVersion) SET t.typeCoupling = t.fanIn + t.fanOut RETURN t.fqn as Type
